statements: SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%campaign%';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, start_date, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND start_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY end_date, start_date;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM campaign;
SELECT name, start_date FROM campaign WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rate WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rate WHERE conversion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, end_date FROM campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(cr.id) AS total_conversions FROM campaign c INNER JOIN conversion_rate cr ON c.id = cr.campaign_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name;
SELECT c.name, AVG(cr.conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM campaign c JOIN conversion_rate cr ON c.id = cr.campaign_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING AVG(cr.conversion_rate) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM campaign_results;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate FROM campaign_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT channel_name FROM channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 200;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM campaign_results;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM channels WHERE channel_name = 'Digital');
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT conversion_id, campaign_id, conversion_date, conversion_value FROM conversions WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT campaigns.campaign_name, campaigns.start_date, conversions.conversion_date FROM campaigns JOIN conversions ON campaigns.campaign_id = conversions.campaign_id WHERE campaigns.start_date > '2021-01-01' AND conversions.conversion_value > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM campaigns JOIN conversions ON campaigns.campaign_id = conversions.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_conversions > 5;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT visitor_id, visit_date FROM visitors ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, page_url FROM pages_visited WHERE visitor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT visitor_id, time_spent_seconds FROM engagement WHERE time_spent_seconds > 60;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT DISTINCT visitor_id, COUNT(page_url) AS pages_visited_count FROM pages_visited GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING COUNT(page_url) > 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, visit_date FROM campaigns c JOIN visitors v ON c.campaign_id = v.campaign_id ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT v.visitor_id, SUM(time_spent_seconds) AS total_time_spent FROM visitors v JOIN engagement e ON v.visitor_id = e.visitor_id GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING SUM(time_spent_seconds) > 60;
